kosmomod24:VoidParticles.NAME: Void Particles
kosmomod24:VoidParticles.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When Exhausted always Purge, NL kosmomod24:Void and Gain !B! Block.
kosmomod24:VoidParticles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When Exhausted always Purge, NL kosmomod24:Void !M! and Gain !B! Block.

kosmomod24:KosmoVoid.NAME: Kosmo Void
kosmomod24:KosmoVoid.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL if you draw a Kosmo card, gain [E]. Non-Kosmo cards are Purged upon draw.

kosmomod24:DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
kosmomod24:DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is kosmomod24:Consumed NL gain !B! Block, NL deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

kosmomod24:KosmoEmergency.NAME: Kosmo Emergency
kosmomod24:KosmoEmergency.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 random Kosmo card. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoDelta.NAME: Kosmo Delta
kosmomod24:KosmoDelta.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

kosmomod24:ForcedRelease.NAME: Forced Release
kosmomod24:ForcedRelease.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void 2. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoExhaustion.NAME: Kosmo Exhaustion
kosmomod24:KosmoExhaustion.DESCRIPTION: kosmomod24:Void. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:KosmoReturn.NAME: Kosmo Return
kosmomod24:KosmoReturn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.

kosmomod24:KosmoDuplication.NAME: Kosmo Duplication
kosmomod24:KosmoDuplication.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Add !M! *Void *Particles to your hand. NL Exhaust.

kosmomod24:EchoOfTheVoid.NAME: Echo Of The Void
kosmomod24:EchoOfTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you Exhaust or Purge a card gain 2 Strength.
kosmomod24:EchoOfTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time each turn you Exhaust or Purge a card gain 2 Strength.

kosmomod24:KosmoGalaxy.NAME: Kosmo Galaxy
kosmomod24:KosmoGalaxy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose !M! cards from the Exhaust pile to kosmomod24:Play and Purge. NL Exhaust.
